articles.title: At least five dead in South Africa floods, mudslides - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: At least five people have been killed in floods and mudslides across South Africa's port city of Durban following heavy rains in recent days, authorities said on Tuesday.

articles.author: Zandile Khumalo
articles.title: UN in SA says attacks on foreigners 'deeply worrisome and unfortunate' - News24
articles.description: The UN in South Africa has expressed "grave concerns" about violent attacks on foreign nationals after Zimbabwean man Elvis Nyathi was assaulted and set alight in Diepsloot.
articles.content:
• The United Nations in South Africa says it's concerned about ongoing attacks on foreign nationals.
  • This comes after the murder of a Zimbabwean man, Elvis Nyathi, in Diepsloot.
